data.name: Sp deems logging piracy
data.desc: Real c√©dula by Queen Regent of Spain directs treatment of Eng loggers as pirates
data.note: 1669 Spain authorises Sp governors' issuance of commissions against Eng /v Zahedieh F 155 /CO 138/1 ff 43, 46, 136 [Modyford to Arlington 6 Jul 1670 / Considerations fm Modyford for fitting privateers]
